docs.text: Welcome If you haven't used Arcane before please visit our quick-start guide For support please visit our discord . Inviting Arcane Invite with Minimum Permissions Invite with Recommended Permissions Tip Recommended Permissions will guarentee Arcane will always have the correct permisisons to do anything.
docs.title: Welcome

docs.text: If you haven't used Arcane before please visit our quick-start guide For support please visit our discord .

docs.text: Invite with Minimum Permissions Invite with Recommended Permissions Tip Recommended Permissions will guarentee Arcane will always have the correct permisisons to do anything.
docs.title: Inviting Arcane

docs.text: Getting Started Using Commands Arcane's commands are ran by a<command name> . If you are missing something Arcane will let you know. To get a list of all of Arcane's commands you should run ahelp .
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: Arcane's commands are ran by a<command name> . If you are missing something Arcane will let you know. To get a list of all of Arcane's commands you should run ahelp .
docs.title: Using Commands

docs.text: Channel Name Provides the name of the channel. {channel.name} -> general ID Provides the ID of the channel. {channel.id} -> 447571516046049301 Mention Mentions the channel. {channel.mention} -> #general
docs.title: Channel

docs.text: Provides the name of the channel. {channel.name} -> general
docs.title: Name

docs.text: Provides the ID of the channel. {channel.id} -> 447571516046049301
docs.title: ID

docs.text: Mentions the channel. {channel.mention} -> #general
docs.title: Mention

docs.text: Guild Name Provides the name of the server. {guild.name} -> Arcane Support ID Provides the id of the server. {guild.id} -> 437808333295058955 Owner Provides the owner's ID. {guild.owner} -> 295980401560649730 Icon Provides the icon of the server. {guild.id} -> https://cdn.discordapp.com/icons/437808333295058955/05b3688d1cf09abfcc6f57d0ac5b7741.jpg?size=128 Membercount Provides the id of the server. {guild.membercount} -> 202
docs.title: Guild

docs.text: Provides the name of the server. {guild.name} -> Arcane Support
docs.title: Name

docs.text: Provides the id of the server. {guild.id} -> 437808333295058955
docs.title: ID

docs.text: Provides the owner's ID. {guild.owner} -> 295980401560649730

docs.text: Provides the icon of the server. {guild.id} -> https://cdn.discordapp.com/icons/437808333295058955/05b3688d1cf09abfcc6f57d0ac5b7741.jpg?size=128
docs.title: Icon

docs.text: Provides the id of the server. {guild.membercount} -> 202
docs.title: Membercount

docs.text: Roles addrole Add a role to the member {addrole:Verified} -> Adds the "Verified" role removerole Removes a role from the member {addrole:Verified} -> Adds the "Verified" role
docs.title: Roles

docs.text: Add a role to the member {addrole:Verified} -> Adds the "Verified" role
docs.title: addrole

docs.text: Removes a role from the member {addrole:Verified} -> Adds the "Verified" role
docs.title: removerole

docs.text: Store db.set Set a keys value {db.set:test:5} db.del Delete a value by the key {db.del:test} db.get Get a value by the key {db.get:test} -> 5 db.delall Delete all keys and there values {db.dellall} db.keys Provides how many keys are stored in the guilds tag store. Each guild is limited to 1,000 keys. {db.keys} -> 152
docs.title: Store

docs.text: Set a keys value {db.set:test:5}
docs.title: db.set

docs.text: Delete a value by the key {db.del:test}
docs.title: db.del

docs.text: Get a value by the key {db.get:test} -> 5
docs.title: db.get

docs.text: Delete all keys and there values {db.dellall}
docs.title: db.delall

docs.text: Provides how many keys are stored in the guilds tag store. Each guild is limited to 1,000 keys. {db.keys} -> 152
docs.title: db.keys

docs.text: Util Delete Deletes the input message {delete} Purge Purges messages in the channel {purge:10} -> Deletes 10 messages {purge} -> Deletes 100 messages Choose Randomly choose from arguments seperated by | {choose:Arcane|Mee6} -> Arcane {choose:Minecraft|Fortnite|Hytale} -> Fortnite
docs.title: Util

docs.text: Deletes the input message {delete}
docs.title: Delete

docs.text: Purges messages in the channel {purge:10} -> Deletes 10 messages {purge} -> Deletes 100 messages
docs.title: Purge

docs.text: Randomly choose from arguments seperated by | {choose:Arcane|Mee6} -> Arcane {choose:Minecraft|Fortnite|Hytale} -> Fortnite
docs.title: Choose
